a.title: The model provides a structured way to capture information about a patientâ€™s interaction with a healthcare service. It enables recording details related to individual encounters and supports linking closely related encounters when needed. Tracking broader or longer episodes of care that extend beyond individual encounters is outside the scope of this model.

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: The model provides a structured way to capture information about a patientâ€™s interaction with a healthcare service. It enables recording details related to individual encounters and supports linking closely related encounters when needed. Tracking broader or longer episodes of care that extend beyond individual encounters is outside the scope of this model.

short.value: Encounter model

definition.value: The model provides a structured way to capture information about a patientâ€™s interaction with a healthcare service. It enables recording details related to individual encounters and supports linking closely related encounters when needed. Tracking broader or longer episodes of care that extend beyond individual encounters is outside the scope of this model.

short.value: Business identifier for the object, unique within its system. Supporting disambiguation between different contexts (systems/countries).
